title: (x) Minnesota Electric Supply Co. - Helvetica Ultra Compressed {Mike Y}
content:
I need some help finding this font.   
   
Thanks ![Minnesota Electric Supply Co.](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110040328im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42241.jpg)
author: popinfresh

comments.content: Maybe [Helvetica Ultra Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110040328/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/ultra-compressed/testdrive.html?s=MINNESOTA%2BELECTRIC%2BSUPPLY%2BCO.&p=48)? Seems a bit closer.
I think it started as one of the extra compressed weights and then got squeezed a little more -- it looks like the horizontal and vertical thicknesses have gone off balance.
